title.v: Khả năng đáp ứng đơn hàng

items.key: loai_vt in ('41', '51', '61') and kieu_hd <> '0' and status = '1'

command.text:
declare @periodCode char(2), @periodName nvarchar(128), @ngay smalldatetime
select @periodCode = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ky_hd_nd' select @periodName = case when @@language = 'v' then ten_ky else ten_ky2 end from mdmky where ma_ky = @periodCode select @ngay = run_date from mplog select @ngay = isnull(@ngay, getdate())
select 'this._date=''' + convert(varchar(8), @ngay, 112) + ''';this._periodCode=''' + @periodCode + ''';this._periodName=''' + replace(replace(isnull(@periodName, ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + '''; set$Form$DefaultValue(this);' as message return

declare @message nvarchar(4000) select @message = 'this._authorize = ' + rtrim(@@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'MPSPromised', 'New')) + ';load$&Identity;$(this);' if @@admin <> 1 begin if not exists(select 1 from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and ma_dvcs = @@unit and r_new = 1) begin select 'this._denyNew = true;' + @message as message return end end select @message as message return

action.text: if exists(select 1 from dmvt where ma_vt = @ma_vt) begin select rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, b.ten_dvt%l, a.nhieu_dvt, ten_loai_vt%l from dmvt a left join dmdvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt left join dmloaivt c on a.loai_vt = c.ma_loai_vt where a.ma_vt = @ma_vt return end

declare @n int, @i int, @h nvarchar(4000), @d smalldatetime select @d = run_date from mplog select @d = isnull(@d, getdate()), @h = '' select @n = val from options where name = 'm_so_ky_hd'
select @i = 1 while (@i <= @n) begin select @h = @h + convert(varchar(10), dbo.mf_GetDOP(@ma_ky, @d, @i, 1), 103) + ',' set @i = @i + 1 end select @n as p, @h as h return
